title: 87/161/EEC: Commission Decision of 19 February 1987 approving a specific programme for the processing of meat and meat products in the Netherlands pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 (only the Dutch text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 19 February 1987
approving a specific programme for the processing of meat and meat products in the Netherlands pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77
(Only the Dutch text is authentic)
(87/161/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The programme relating to the processing of meat and meat products, as notified on 19 November 1985 and as supplemented on 22 February 1986 by the Netherlands Government in accordance with Regulation (EEC) No 355/77, is hereby approved, except for those investments which relate to products not listed in Annex II of the Treaty.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of the Netherlands.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 February 1987.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 51, 23. 2. 1977, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 194, 17. 7. 1986, p. 4.
